items.title: Hypoelliptic Regularity
items.content:
1404: :label: cor-hypoelliptic-regularity
1405: 
1406: If $\mathcal{L}_{\text{kin}}[\rho] = f$ with $f \in C^\infty(\Omega)$, then $\rho \in C^\infty(\Omega)$.
items.raw_directive:

1403: :::{prf:corollary} Hypoelliptic Regularity

1406: If $\mathcal{L}_{\text{kin}}[\rho] = f$ with $f \in C^\infty(\Omega)$, then $\rho \in C^\infty(\Omega)$.
